annotations:
To: Chartering Desk
Pls pps suitable for our below lady, thanks.

LAST CARGO: GENERAL CARGO-I.ORE-GRAIN

Remarks：
（1）Speed/ consumption are given bss good weather and sea conditions up to/INCLUDING wind force 4 of beaufort scale and douglas sea state 3 （max significant wave height 1.25m) with no adverse current and no negative influence of swell, Good weather day for performance evaluation purposes is defined/valid only from Noon to Noon with all parts of it (6 hourly periods or less) complying to above criteria.No extraplolation of good weather analysis can be made to overall voyage.Any gain on time and/or consumption to be off-set against loss on time and/or consumption if any.
（2）Vessel has the right to burn mdo while maneuvering in/out of ports and navigating in narrow waters, rivers, channels etc.
（3）Charterer shall replenish bunkers as per the standard (ifo380; iso8217:2010/2017 rmg380. mgo: iso 8217:2010/2017 dma).
（4）Bimco fuel sulphur content clause for time charter parties to apply
